features: POWERFUL TURBOFAN - This air circulator fan has 3 speeds and a 90 degree tilt and is powerful enough so your living room/bedroom etc… can get cooled off in no time, and will give you the ultimate comfortable and cooling environment. Dimensions: 10.25” x 5.8” x 11.3”

AIR CIRCULATOR - This fan is equipped with a constructed turbo design to maximize air movement, offering the power for intense air movement, therefore, air cooling circulation can reach all of your living area, and creates pleasant quarters. Imagine the relieve of a small fan with power you can feel from 25 feet away

FEATURED ATTRIBUTES - With its sturdy non slip rubber base This fan will stay firm on its place, you can adjust it to a variety of 3 speed powers and 90 degree up to down and easily turn the air flow to any direction (optional wall mount), this fan comes with a carry handle and is light-weight, just pick it it up and roll….

ENERGY SAVING - The summer time arrives and your AC keeps working non-stop, it’s about time to start saving. This fantastic quiet operating fan is built to create a comfortable and cooling environment with energy-saving power, so it won’t affect your wallet, stop paying and start enjoying….

STOP SWEATING - After a stressful day, or at night in your bedroom, you want to relax but the heat, the sweat it’s just unbearable, and you start looking for a solution, “Nexair fans” comes to the rescue, with these powerful fans you can enjoy anything you think of, family time, reading, studying, and of-course good relaxation time to clear your mind….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great little fan, moves the air pretty good for its size. But I usually use a fan as like a white noise generator to drown out outside noises and this little guy is so quiet it barely does that. Happy with the fan and will get much use out of it but may have to consider buying an actual noise generator

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Portable Fan!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This fan functions even better than I thought! High setting of the fan, blows air better than I thought for its size! Cool air, and not at all very noisy which is impressive to me.Thinking about buying a 2nd one as a gift for one of my coworkers!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NEXAIR Air Circulator Portable Turbo Fan A User-Friendly Review
reviews.reviewText: In this user-friendly review of the NEXAIR Air Circulator Portable Turbo Fan, I’ll highlight its cost-effectiveness and ease of portability. It’s not excessively large, making it easy to transport and set up. No assembly is required; just plug it in for instant use. Moreover, safety is a priority as the freestanding fan features blades that are sealed behind a protective grille, preventing the risk of finger injuries. The unboxing process is straightforward compared to larger, complex fans. The product comes with a helpful manual, but I wish it were sealed in plastic like the fan's packaging to prevent the paper from crumbling inside the box.Upon inspection, the fan appears to be sturdy, and the material used feels durable, with a tactile quality that leans toward a plastic-like hardness. The fan also doesn’t produce a distracting noise, making it suitable for a quiet work environment, even when wearing headphones.It provides a wide-reaching breeze, allowing you to feel its breeze from a considerable distance. The fan delivers a powerful and refreshing cooling effect. It’s a classic choice at an affordable price. The product fits nicely in the box for storage, and the packaging is easy to open. Setting it up was a straightforward and user-friendly process. It’s a user-friendly fan in my opinion.It's versatile in ways that are suitable for both floor placement and carrying. You can place it steadily on many surfaces or even mount it on your wall.In conclusion, it’s a well-rounded product with room for improvement. Better options for rotation, since you can only rotate the fan around 180 degrees up and down and not side to side in a full 360 degrees. The rotation process is not automatic like some other fans; nonetheless, it might take a bit more effort to rotate it to the angle you want. Additional settings would enhance its overall performance. So, I feel like you might have to sometimes move the fan around depending on where in the room you are at to feel its breeze. I would recommend it for someone wanting a basic user-friendly fan that is easy to move around the house or the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What can I say? It's a fan for mercy sake. Arrived early. Good condition. Turns off and on, in three different speeds. Like I said it's a fan..

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Like size was hoping airFlow would be a littleStronger This fan's high is like a 20 inch fan's low.It will work for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work on low speed.
reviews.reviewText: The fan won't operate on low speed. When the switch is turned to low speed, the fan quits. Works fine on high and medium speeds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nexair Turbo Fan
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this fan! The best investment for the price. It’s not noisy, it’s bigger than I thought(based on price), and it does a phenomenal job keeping the entire room cooled. Don’t miss out on this amazing deal!
